TopicTitle: My Game Lags when I put multiple radial parachutes on my rockets

Articles.Content:
For SOME reason, when I put more than one radial parachute on my rocket with symmetry mode, my game just starts lagging for no reason. When I put the parachutes on one by one, it doesn't lag.

My mods:

Asclepius

Chute Safety Indicator

Firespitter Core

Habitat Pack

Kerbal Planetary Base Systems

Kopernicus

Landing Height Display

Layered Animations

ShowAllFuels

TweakScale

Vertical Velocity Controller

Animate Emissive Module

BetterTimeWarp

HyperEdit

MechJeb 2

Module Manager

PersistentThrust

StageRecovery

Thermometer
